events.title: Annual General Meeting
events.description: The annual general meeting for all Samaj members to discuss the progress and future plans. This meeting will include reports from all committees, financial statements review, and elections for new committee members. All registered members are requested to attend.

events.title: Youth Sports Tournament
events.description: A day of sports activities for the youth including cricket, football, and athletics. Open to all youth members ages 12-25. Refreshments will be provided. Participants should come in appropriate sportswear and bring water bottles.

events.title: Diwali Celebration
events.description: Annual Diwali celebration with cultural performances, traditional food, and fireworks display. Join us for an evening of lights, music, and celebration. Traditional attire is encouraged. Family event open to all community members.

events.title: Business Networking Mixer
events.description: An evening of business networking for entrepreneurs and professionals from our community. Share ideas, make connections, and explore potential collaborations. Light refreshments and business card exchange included.

events.title: Health and Wellness Camp
events.description: Free health checkups, consultations with specialists, and wellness workshops. Services include blood pressure monitoring, diabetes screening, eye checkups, and dental examinations. Open to all community members.

events.title: Women's Entrepreneurship Workshop
events.description: A workshop focused on empowering women entrepreneurs with business skills, marketing strategies, and financial planning. Includes panel discussions with successful women entrepreneurs and networking opportunities.

events.title: Youth Leadership Development Program
events.description: A full-day program designed to develop leadership skills in young adults aged 16-25. Sessions on communication, teamwork, problem-solving, and community service. Certificates will be awarded to all participants who complete the program.

events.title: Emergency Response Training
events.description: Training in basic first aid, CPR, fire safety, and emergency response procedures. Learn how to respond effectively during emergencies and potentially save lives. All participants will receive a first aid manual and certificate.

events.title: Annual Cooking Competition
events.description: Showcase your culinary skills in our annual cooking competition. Categories include traditional Gujarati dishes, innovative fusion, and desserts. Prizes will be awarded to winners in each category. Open to all community members.

events.title: Career Guidance Fair
events.description: Guidance for students on various career options, higher education opportunities, and scholarship programs. Representatives from universities and industry professionals will be available for consultations. Open to students in grades 9-12 and their parents.

events.title: Tree Planting Initiative
events.description: Join our environmental conservation effort by planting trees in Karura Forest. Help create a greener future for our community. Tools and saplings will be provided. Please wear appropriate clothing and footwear for outdoor activities.

events.title: Senior Citizens' Day Out
events.description: A special day trip for our senior community members to Nairobi National Park. Transportation, meals, and guided tour included. Please bring any necessary medications and wear comfortable clothing and shoes.

events.title: Financial Planning Seminar
events.description: Learn about investment opportunities, retirement planning, and wealth management from financial experts. Topics include property investment, stock market basics, mutual funds, and tax planning strategies.

events.title: Blood Donation Camp
events.description: Donate blood and save lives. All healthy individuals between 18-65 years are encouraged to participate. Light refreshments will be provided to donors. Please bring ID and have a light meal before donating.

events.title: Children's Art and Craft Workshop
events.description: A fun-filled day of art and craft activities for children aged 5-12. Materials will be provided. Children will create paintings, crafts, and learn basic origami. Parents are welcome to join and assist younger children.
